title: So as of yesterday, my phone battery percentage is stuck at 91% The hell is the problem?
content:
Battery meter stuck at 91%
It's not actually 91% obviously, but no matrer how long it's on charge, or discharge, it doesn't change.
Tried everything except factory reset, which I would prefer to avoid...
Anyone had this or similar problems? Can it be fixed? And if so, how?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
